newsitem.title: USA: AFTER THE BELL - BMC Software shares rise.
newsitem.headline: AFTER THE BELL - BMC Software shares rise.

text.p: Shares of BMC Software Inc climbed one point in early after-hours trading after the company posted strong second-quarter results, traders said.
The company reported net income of $0.66 per share, up from $0.50 per share a year earlier. The company also said it would set a two-for-one stock split.
BMC shares rose to 85, up one from its close of 84.
AMP Inc fell after hours to 37-1/2 from a close of 38-1/4, traders said. The company posted third-quarter net income of $0.43 per share compared to $0.51 per share a year earlier.

AMP, which reported quarterly sales of $1.34 billion compared to $1.30 billion, also said it expected its margin pressure to continue into the fourth quarter. The company fell 5/8 to 38-1/4 during market hours.

The New York Stock Exchange said its session one volume was 3,100 shares compared with 108,500 shares on Tuesday. Session two volume was 2,527,200 shares compared with no activity on Tuesday, the NYSE said.
The American Stock Exchange said there was no after-hours activity.
